message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $130. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $130 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
